display_long_description:
Hellfire Rampage VR is an intense and hot combat game.

You are a scientist and the inventor of teleportation.
One day, you discover strange activity in an unknown world. 
After investigating, you learn that hellish creatures are preparing to invade humanity.

Their main source of power is magical essences, and they are gathering them to strengthen their army.

Your mission is to stop their plans and save humanity by collecting these crystals first.

Your main abilities are time control and space manipulation.
Use them to slow down time and perform quick dash jumps
(perfect for dodging enemy attacks and launching counterattacks)

Deflect bullets back at enemies by striking them with your weapon, turning defense into offense.

- Explore dangerous locations and find all hidden crystals.
- Face and defeat a variety of hellish monsters.
- Discover unique and creative weapons to help you succeed.

Exciting combat mechanics, challenging adventures, and hellike battles await you.

Are you ready to save humanity?
